title: Spacious, Open Layout, Newly Renovated Full Floor Flat
description: Large, open layout, very spacious and beautiful full floor flat available for rent in SOMA (South of Market) in the center of countless restaurants, bars, tech and numerous other companies and conveniences like Trader Joe's, Costco, Target, etc.  The entire flat is for rent.FLAT DETAILS:Full three separate bedrooms.  Bedroom one is very large.  Bedroom two is large.  Bedroom three is small (can fit queen sized bed, desk, etc.).  Tenants to determine breakdown of rent between rooms.Large separate living room.Very large separate kitchen with plenty of space for dining and large tables, with designer large, modern, dark and clean style format porcelain tiles.  Kitchen includes stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, garbage disposal, etc.One bathroom with built in tub and shower with large format, designer dark colored porcelain tiles in tub to ceiling and throughout all floor areas of bathrooms.Very dark and solid hardwood (mahogany) floors throughout entire flat, including all bedrooms, closets, hallway, living room, etc., except bathrooms and kitchen which are tiled with designer large, modern, dark and clean style format porcelain tiles.In flat/unit large separate laundry room with washer and dryer as well as extra space for storage for exclusive use by only the one flat.Large hallway closet for additional storage.High ceilings.  New and large double pane windows throughout entire flat.Tons of natural light throughout entire flat, South facing building.Concrete paved backyard, which is common area for the building and can be used for things like barbecuing, etc.Incredibly maintained flat.Great tenants in building, all professionals, e.g., Google, Uber, Stanford Funds, etc.Square footage information is estimated.There is an in building covered garage parking for a car and possibly a couple of motorcycles, but it is currently rented out.  You can be the first on the waiting list.  for a separate amount of $230.  [There is an in building covered garage parking for a car and possibly a couple of motorcycles, but the car space is currently being rented out.  You can be first on the waiting list if you want.]  There is also a large public and pay garage parking complex starting around ½ block away from the flat/building with some hundreds of parking spaces.  In addition, starting about ½ block away from the flat/building in various and multiple directions, there is regular street parking that is non-metered designed for residents so you don’t have to worry about having to constantly feed meters (last I heard the parking permit fee for these non-metered spaces, which allows you to park for greater than 2 hours, overnight, etc., is $144 per year, or $72 for half-year, so they’re meant for residents and applying I understand is pretty easy).  Lastly, the area is filled with businesses, so street parking spaces change hands and open up quite frequently.LOCATION DETAILS:Near numerous tech and other companies, such as Twitter, Uber, Square, Zynga, Dolby Laboratories, Adobe Systems, etc.The flat/building is located in the heart and midst of one of the most bustling, vibrant, and densely concentrated collection of the hippest and chic restaurants, bistros, bars, night clubs, art galleries, wine merchants, boutiques, lounges, night spots, theaters, both specialty and large groceries, and host of other commercial businesses, in all of San Francisco. In the immediate area are some of the trendiest restaurants like Sushi Ondo, Bar Agricole, Perennial and Zuni Café to more traditional fairs like Zaoh, Don Ramon's and 1601 Bar & Kitchen. Starting approximately 1 ½ blocks away, dozens of bars, night clubs, music venues, and lounges of every type, from traditional to eclectic, line the streets, such as Wish, Butter, Tank18, Bergerac, Calle-11sf Nightclub, Halcyon SF, Slims, Willows, Forgery Bar, Holy Cow, Audio Nightclub, SRO/Oddjob, DNA Lounge, Driftwood, Azucar Lounge, Verso, Zeitgeist, etc. A highly commercial area too -- within walking distance, are hundreds of conveniences such as Trader Joe's, Target, Foods Co., Rainbow Grocery, Costco, The Market, Best Buys, Bed Bath & Beyond, OfficeMax, etc. Technically, one doesn't need a car living in this area. This corridor continues to be one of the hippest and fastest, continuously developing commercial areas in San Francisco, offering a high level, in-demand lifestyle in one of the busiest, hip and urban environments in San Francisco. City living at its best.Nearby and surrounding areas include Union Square and Financial District to the Northeast, Civic Center/Hayes Valley/Opera District to the North, Embarcadero to the East, Oracle Ball Park to the South, and the Mission District to the West.The building/flat is also just blocks to the on and off ramps of all of the San Francisco Freeways, including U.S. 101, U.S. 280 and U.S. 80, which go southbound to Silicon Valley/San Jose/Peninsula/etc., northbound to Golden Gate Bridge/Marin/etc., and eastbound to Berkeley/Hayward/Walnut Creek/Oakland/etc., providing quick and easy access to all parts of the Bay Area (a great deal of traffic and drive time is cut to various parts of the Bay Area, such as the South Bay and East Bay).Area served by numerous modes of public transportation. CONTACT INFO:Contact: IMPORTANT, you can email me, which I check regularly and will respond quickly, but please try to call and/or text me as well.  Emails sometimes don’t seem to consistently come through.  If a request to view or an inquiry reaches me, I almost always respond back within 15 minutes (regardless of whether or not the place is still available).  If you don’t hear from me, I didn’t get your message, so please call and/or text also.  Tony, owner, cell:  show contact info.  Select above Reply Button or Show Contact Info Button for other contact info as well.  Flexible showing times.  You can see the apartment in person, or through zoom or a similar app where I am live at the property.One month security deposit.  First month rent due on date of move in.Typically one year term.  If you need a shorter term we can work something out.Available now, flexible move in date.

Unit features hardwood flooring, a remodeled kitchen, a remodeled Primary Bedroom with spa like bath, in unit washer and dryer and a wonderful front balcony to take in the weather in the sunniest part of the city. title: Wonderful, Warm and Bright Classic SF 1bd Flat
description: Nicely updated, modern where it needs to be, classic where you want it to be, 1bd flat in a quintessentially classic San Francisco building. Meticulously cared for over the years the property features newer plumbing with solar heating for the ecologically aware tenant, shared laundry, a wonderful garden perfect for relaxing around the bbq and bike racks for most residents. This 2nd floor flat features luxurious carpeting, an updated modern efficiency kitchen, and plenty of closet space. The verdant views looking north over Alta Plaza Park flood this residence with a warmth beyond just temperature. And then there is the location...hard to beat. Located on a quaint tree lined section of Pine St within walking distance of the world class dining and shopping of the Fillmore district, the convenience of the Divisadero Corridor, and just three blocks to the jewel of San Francisco outdoor space, Alta Plaza Park.

Easy Access with a Walk Score of 100.18. Hardwood Floor Throughout.19. Recently Remodeled in 2016 with Earthquake Retrofitted.20. Open Floor Design Plan with Lots of Sun.21. Within the Two Mile Radius, you have Megastores like Costco, Best Buy, Walgreen, Safeway, Whole Food, Trader Joe, Nordstorm Rack, T-Mobile, Office Max, Enterprise Car Rental, U-Haul. Also, Farmers Market (Wednesdays and Thursdays).22. The Famous Dolores Park is about One Mile away from Our Building.23. Whole Food and Safeway are about 2 blocks away from the building (So, you can walk rather than drive).24. Easy Access to Freeway.25. Great Insulation against the weather. Unlike other older buildings, our Modern Victorian building is highly insulated. We have totally remodeled/Insulated the unit inside out.26. Walking distance from the techno-elite bus stop locations.27 Next Door is a Convenient Store that opens till midnight which makes it easy for you to get your basic needs.28. Unlike new apartment buildings, they can raise the rent at any amount and at any time after your lease expired.29. This unit is UNIQUE in San Francisco. This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 753 Sq. Ft.  In a city with more than its share of beautiful, historic landmarks, there is one building that combines modern conveniences with a Landmark Life on the center of Market Street – The Wilson. Built in 1904, then a survivor of the 1906 earthquake, The Wilson has been completely re-imagined and re-established for the 21st century resident seeking a home with a story to share for generations to come. Having seen the city grow-up and transform around it, The Wilson is now the premiere address for residents looking to do more than just rent an apartment; The Wilson is for those looking to live the Landmark Life.The Wilson's unique architectural flair joins modern luxury finishes with historic architectural detail. The apartments and lofts feature natural light, oversized rooms, and are wired for high-speed internet and cable. Got some downtime and need to unwind? If you want somewhere serene to clear your head, you need look no further than our smoke-free community with long private balconies, gated off-street parking, free bike storage, and parcel lockers.With easy access to I-84 and I-5, The Irvington is just minutes away from Downtown Portland and The Pearl District. Our community offers you the very best of the city from the peaceful confines of the historic Irvington and Sullivan’s Gulch neighborhoods. Our Walk Score of 87 makes us as a “Very Walkable” location and our Bike Score of 100 makes us a “Biker’s Paradise”. Rest assured, you can explore the area and nearby Portland with or without a car. At The Irvington, we get that life can sometimes get hectic, busy, or just downright stressful. We offer our residents a myriad of top-notch amenities to make life that much easier so that you have more time to kick back. The Irvington provides residents with roomy one-bedroom apartment floor plans with modern design and filled with closets, so you can find the home that fits your lifestyle for years to come. title: Renovated Victorian artist lofts at Geary & Van Ness
description: Remodeled Victorian Mini-Lofts in the Emeric-Goodman Building, an official City landmark. Studios with sleeping lofts. Geary @ Van Ness.Full one bedroom unit with southern exposure. Also available:Studio with separate sleeping loft. = 1BR. $1780-1880 (single occupant rate). Security deposit = 1.75 rent with good credit. College students with parent co-signers ok. Listed on the National Register of Historic Places. National Register #75000473San Francisco Landmark #71: This building was constructed by Joseph Emeric from France as his residence. It remained in his family until 1899 when his granddaughter sold it to Abraham and Sarah Goodman from New York. The Goodmans ran a tailoring business on the ground floor and lived above the store. After surviving the Great Earthquake and Fire, the building was extensively repaired and modernized. The building was completely renovated again between 1983-1985 preserving all the historical details, including the Victorian façade and birdcage elevator. The renovation received a citation for architectural conservation from Foundation for San Francisco's Architectural Heritage. Janis Joplin lived in the building in the early sixties, as did Wes Wilson,  the artist who created the first Psychedelic posters for the musical events at the Avalon-Family Dog and Fillmore-Bill Graham venues.Several unique units available with lofts and/or with separate bedrooms. New hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances, granite counters, spiral staircase to sleeping loft with floor to ceiling bookcases and closets on 2 levels. The sleeping loft is the bedroom and is not high enough to stand for most people. Birdcage elevator. Large windows. Laundry in building. Bicycle room. Roof deck. Non-smoking building. Close to Civic Center, Japantown, Van Ness movie theaters, major churches and best bus (Geary/O'Farrell 38). Garage parking available nearby

title: SRO Housing Available in the Tenderloin Area
description: **Project Based Section 8 Housing** NOTE: Each Unit has its own Bathroom and Kitchen. THE APARTMENT: This studio apartment is located in the Tenderloin area 2 blocks from Civic Center Plaza. The unit comes with a full bathroom, and mini kitchen area. The unit has large windows to allow for maximum air flow and allows for an abundance of light to shine through the unit. The units also have ceiling fans to support residents on warmers days as well as heaters for residents to get warm and cozy during the winter.  LOCATION: TenderloinThe Tenderloin area is very close to downtown and Civic Center Plaza. There are multiple restaurants in the area with a wide range of cuisines and various dining experiences. Civic Center Plaza has a beautiful park for residents with children and pets to enjoy. Lastly, there is public transportation available within blocks of the property, providing easy access to the 19 Polk, 5 Fulton, and many more bus lines.  -blocks from Housing Authority of SF, Walgreens, Starbucks, and all of what Market Street has to offer -close to playgrounds and greenery -less than 15 minute walk to major public transportation stops (muni and Bart)! title: Huge Classic Studio in great area - Move in bonus - available today!
description: At the corner of Broadway and Van Ness Avenue, this secure and safe building is just a block away from the best blocks of Polk.  at 550 square feet, its one of the largest studios in the area.    Large main room, with a walk in closet off that main room that would fit a full size bed or can easily be turned into an office nook.   It's on the second floor of the apartment building.   Radiator heat is included.  This apartment has lots of traffic, so if street noise bothers you, its not the place for you.  Full size refrigerator and new full size gas range.   Cable available.    Mailboxes are inside with updated security systems and remote access to let deliveries in.   We are showing today! Call or text to schedule a showing.   Application fee is $25; refunded if you sign a lease.   On a one year lease, we are offering "Month 13" free as a signing bonus.This is an incredible neighborhood.  Walk to all the shops and restaurants, with Walgreens, Starbucks, Peets, Nick Tacos, Lord Stanley, and lots of safe day and nightlife just a block away.  No laundry in the building, but wash and fold and dry cleaners are also a block away.   There is no parking in the building, no dogs/cats or big pets allowed.

title: Six room furnished flat in Liberty Hill, between Noe Valley and the Mi
description: .Classic 6 room flat in Historic 1905 building with original architectural details. Ideal walkable location 10 minutes walk to 25th St BART station,, shuttles, buses, vibrant Mission cultural activities, and restaurants. Close to Noe Valley shops, cafes.The flat has been newly rehabbed with care taken to preserve original charm. Hardwood floors in the living room, hallways, and bedrooms.The floor plan is flexible with good separation between rooms. The flat can be configured as a 3 or 4 bedroom space.The spacious living room has high ceilings and window bays facing south, filling the flat with natural light year-round. Large eat-in kitchen. with refinished pine floors, dishwasher, gas stove, lots of storage in the pantry area.Good-sized mudroom off of the kitchen.Coin-operated washer dryer in the laundry room next to the unit. Not shared with other units. Tiled full bathroom with a shower over a bathtub and a half-bath.Three large bedrooms, all are entered through a central hallway.Bedroom #1 has a beautiful 3-window-bay with south-facing outlooks and a large closet.Bedroom #2  is very large with north-facing windows.Bedroom #3 is another large room with a big closet and south-facing windows.Bedrooms 2 and 3 were the once "double parlor" of Victorian buildings. Original parlor doors separate the rooms.There is also a smaller room, 7' by 7'10" (not including a large closet with a built-in bureau).1129 A Guerrero has the charm of a historic building, a fabulous location, and a clean move-in-ready condition. The flat is furnished and is currently set up as 4 bedrooms.One block from Valencia St stores and cafes.Walk score: 98Transit score: 84Bike score: 83.Less than a 10-minute walk to 24th St BART station.Features:Rehabbed throughoutRefinished hardwood floorsEastern exposure offers wonderful natural light and views.The bedroom has a large closet, there is also a deep, large, hall closet.The unit has a flexible floor plan easily configured as a 3 or 4 bedroom apartmentLarge, bright eat-in kitchen with gas stove, dishwasher, and ample storage/work area.coin-op washer dryer.

title: HUGE Room GG Bridge Downtown SF FiDi UCSF USF CPMC SFSU Kaiser TechBus
description: This spacious bedroom has 9 foot high ceilings is very large at approx. 154 sq ft.Greeted by a welcoming entrance foyer as you enter the apartment. Beautiful remodeled kitchen with new granite counter tops and plenty of oak wood cabinetry for storage. Updated bathroom with recessed lights in the hallway and high ceilings.Leave all your transportation worries behind where having a car isn't necessary. Live in this desirable Inner Richmond / Laurel Heights neighborhood where you can walk to everything! And where public transportation is abundant.Minutes to University of San Francisco and the world famous Golden Gate Bridge.Cleaning service included- cleaning lady comes at least 1-2 times a week to clean the common area, kitchen, bathroom, hallway, stairway, and taking out the trash for you so you don't have to do it.Bus lines will take you to downtown Embarcadero Ferry Building or Ocean Beach in the opposite direction. Within 2-3 blocks you will find major bus lines such at the 38 Geary, 1 California, 2 Clement, 5 Fulton and 29 Sunset that can all take you to SF downtown financial district and different parts of town.There is also the Google, Apple shuttle bus several blocks away on Geary and Park Presidio Blvd. 2 blocks away is the Golden Gate Park where you will find the deYoung Museum and the Academy of Sciences. Kaiser Hospital is minutes away on Geary Blvd. close to Japantown and AMC Kabuki Theater. San Francisco VA Medical Center is also in the same Richmond neighborhood. Across the park you will find UCSF medical hospital.When it comes to grocery shopping or dining you will find a PLETHORA of restaurants and super markets stretching miles and miles on Geary Blvd. and Clement St. To add to that there is also a Safeway several blocks away on 7th Ave and Cabrillo. A Trader Joes and Target on Geary and Masonic. Farmer's Market every Sundays on Clement St. / 3rd Ave. There are two laundromats within 1-2 blocks away.Common bathroom and kitchen are shared among the roommates. There are three guy roommates who work in Apple as a product manager, a researcher at a biotech firm and a graphic designer.$79 per month for all utilities which include wifi, water, gas, electricity, garbage and renters insurance. Cleaning service for common areas.Sorry, no pets. Must be respectful of neighbors, no loud noises or parties. No smoking or drugs. One person occupancy only. Ft. The Fillmore Center is surrounded by a community so diverse it feels like a city within a city with its own unique blend of shops, cafes and theaters. At home, you'll actually find space to stretch out and relax or recharge, a hard-to-find commodity here in San Francisco. Not to mention upgraded kitchen and bathroom features to enhance your lifestyle. When the day is done, you'll enjoy dazzling skyline views of the city and the fog rolling in at night. title: 4 BR, 2 BATH, + Den + Sun rm, Hdwd : TOP FLOOR !
description: ** 3D Walking tour here --->https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=kNvuTwN14CT&brand=04 BR, 2 BATH, plus Den plus Sun room, Hardwood, very very very SPACIOUS 2nd floor unit : Your space to live, work, collaborate, and Change-The-World**Beautiful European-looking building, W/D hookup in building, Bike racks available*** $7,995/month Available for Immediate Occupancy Now****Shown by appointment ONLYPlease send us email or call  show contact info for appointment to view this beautiful 4 BR / 2Ba unit.Please use the following link to find a 3D Walking tour --->https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=kNvuTwN14CT&brand=0A LITTLE ABOUT THE BUILDING : We have an absolutely gorgeous Building with Security Gate and Modern Intercom. The exterior of the building has a stunning European-looking flair ! There are only 2 Residential and 1 Commercial (ground floor Cleaners) units in the building, on 3 floors. The interior hallway and stairs to the two residential flats have rich colors, and beautiful ornamental lights throughout.A LOT MORE ABOUT THE 4 BR UNIT on the 2nd Floor : (Follow the floorplan diagram provided in the photos) As you reach the 2nd floor landing (3 floors in total) and open the front door, you will be greeted by warm hardwood floors and beautiful new paint throughout the apartment. The ceilings are about 11 feet high and have very nice vaulted details. Close the front door, and look to your Left (due North) and Right (due South, towards Market Street) to the beautiful and long Victorian hallway. To your immediate RIGHT is the entry to the SUNROOM and the LIVING ROOM (both facing Market Street) : .The SUNROOM has high ceilings, large vinyl double-glazed windows for insulation, and a large 2nd level /loft area for storage.LIVING ROOMNow walk back to the Master hallway, facing towards the end of the building, and turn immediately to the first doorway on your RIGHT. Now you are gazing into the amazing, rich, spacious, and sunny LIVING ROOM area -- WOW !!! There's a large and beautiful chandelier in the center of the room. To your Left is a huge floor-to-ceiling double pocket door that separates the LR from Bedroom #1. Directly in front of you is an ornamental and purely decorative fireplace mantle (not functional !) To your RIGHT is the AWESOME Bay Windows (all vinyl, double glazed for insulation) facing Market Street.BEDROOM #1Now lets walk out of the LIVING ROOM, turn RIGHT and face the Master hallway again  Walk a couple of steps and to your right is another doorway to BEDROOM #1. All of the approximate room dimensions are available on the floorplan diagram in the Google Photo album. This is a very spacious room with double pocket doors that separate this room from the LIVING ROOM. There is a very large window (vinyl, double glazed) facing the Eastern lightwell, and a very good sized closet to store your belongings.BEDROOM #2 and #3Now lets walk out of BR #1 turn RIGHT and walk a few steps down the Master Hallway towards the end of the building. The next two doorways will enter into BEDROOM #2 and BEDROOM #3. These two rooms are a little bit smaller than BR #1, however they are still very good size rooms, with large windows (vinyl, double glazed) facing the Eastern lightwell, and very good sized closets for storing your belongings.CLOSET UNDER STAIRCASE Now as you get to the area between BR #1 and BR #2, look to your LEFT and you will see a closet door that covers the staircase going to the upstairs unit, and contains a good amount of space underneath for storage. Directly behind the closet is a very good sized space with bike racks, and a very large window (vinyl, double-glazed) facing the Western lightwell of the building.BEDROOM #4 : One of the larger bedrooms !!!Now walk out of BR #3 and walk towards the end of the building - to your LEFT is another very large window (vinly, double-glazed) facing the Western lightwell of the building. Immediately to your RIGHT is another doorway that enters into BEDROOM #4. This room has a closet on the LEFT and a built in cabinet / closet on the RIGHT. Immediately in front of you is another very large window, and you may have already guessed it is also vinyl and double-glazed OK. I get the sense that you are tired, and probably want to catch your breath before we move on to the Full Bath Full-Bath, Kitchen, Porch, Laundry area w W/D hookups (you need to get your own W/D !), Den room and tons of storage ! Are you ready now ???TWO (2 !) FULL BATHROOMSAs you walk out of BR #4 and look down the Master Hallway you will see a doorway to your LEFT, the 1st Full-Bath #1, and a doorway in front of you, the 2nd Full-Bath #2. Lets check out the Full Bath #1 first ! As you walk in you will see a shower stall area with overhead shower to your RIGHT, and a wash basin, and toilet to your LEFT. Directly in front of you is a very good sized mirror !As you walk out of the Full Bath #1 and turn LEFT, you will enter the Full Bath #2. To your LEFT is a very good sized older bath tub with overhead shower, followed by a toilet, and good sized wash basin and large mirror.KITCHEN : Are you ready for this !!!!???Now lets leave the Full Bath #2 and look straight down the Master Hallway to see the other end of the hallway where we left the Sunroom and Living Room, which are facing Market Street. Lets turn LEFT and face the doorway of the amazing and expansive Kitchen. Stare from the RIGHT and in front you for the wraparound granite countertop. There is a dishwasher !!! Next to it is a full sink, GE Profile gas stove, GE Profile microwave, and GE Profile double sided Refrigerator /Freezer. WOW !!! Now look up at the ceiling area and you will see gorgeous light fixtures throughout the Kitchen that really make this one of the warmest rooms in the unit !!! Please note that every light fixture in this unit has new dimmable LED lights !!! To the LEFT of the Refrigerator is a built-in pantry area to store spices, utensils, etc. To the LEFT of the pantry is a very large window made of wood, and a very large door that leads to the Patio area and Den.PATIO-FAMILY-ENTERTAINMENT AREA , STORAGE, LAUNDRY W/D HOOKUP, and A DEN (oh my !!!)The final doorway from inside the KITCHEN goes to the very large covered and carpeted patio area that can serve as a family/entertainment area. To your LEFT is a loft storage area, and directly beneath is more storage area that contains the hot water boiler, and the W/D hookup -- you need to provide your own W/D ! To your RIGHT is a separate DEN room for work, meditation, etc. It also has a closet, and a loft area for more storage.CONGRATULATIONS ! We just walked through the entire unit Do you have any questions ?Here are a list of frequently asked questions, and our attempt at providing answers :1. CABLE TV WIRED : Tenant pays equipment, service and subscription with cable company.2. PACIFIC GAS AND ELECTRIC (PG&E) : Tenant is responsible to pays for PG&E services.3. HOT /COLD WATER and GARBAGE : Tenant pays for Hot and Cold water Garbage services4. WASHER & DRYER : Building has W/D hookup. Tenant provides washer and dryer. Laundromats and dry cleaners within a few steps.Please send us email for appointment to view this beautiful apartment.A LITTLE MORE ABOUT THE LOCATION : This beautiful building is at a key intersection of Market Street with Guerrero St, Laguna St and Hermann St, and it is one block from the OCTAVIA BOULEVARD / HAYES VALLEY extension from Highway 80. This is a High-Density zoned area of Market Street with easy access to public transportation via BART stations, Muni street line and bus stops nearby. SAFEWAY is 1 block away (Yes !) as is WHOLE FOODS near the Dolores St entrance.YOU'RE PROBABLY WONDERING ABOUT PARKING : We don't have parking in the building. For those of you who are new, the City will issue a S-permit with your lease agreement which lets you bypass the 2 hour limit signs (exception of Street Cleaning days/times and No Parking Any Time). Developing good parking karma will happen with time, patience, and experience (watching Kung Fu Panda part 1 will help). For anyone with expensive cars or working variable hours, there is paid public parking next door.A LITTLE BIT ABOUT YOURSELF : We LOVE interesting people with wonderful life stories. Please be a NON-smoker with a stable job, good income, good credit, good references, good rental history with No Evictions. We have our own application process and there is a $35 fee per applicant . This apartment is most suitable for 3 -- 4 room-mates. No subleasing. No AirBnB. 1 year minimum lease agreement.Our pet policy : Cat is OK for an extra fee, and $30/mo added to rent per cat. No other types of pets/animals are permitted in the building.

title: Newly Renovated Single Room #07 in North Beach/ Chinatown!
description: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! WALK SCORE OF 99!The unit is newly remodeled with a kitchenette. Bathroom is conveniently located down the hall. The room is spacious and the perfect size for anyone who wants to experience the hustle and bustle of real San Francisco living.Located in the heart North Beach and Chinatown. Within steps from many restaurants, bars, and local markets for fresh produce and meats. Local restaurants within just a few blocks include Mama's, Tony's Pizza, the House Restaurant, Sotto Mare, the Stinking Rose, Golden Boy Pizza, Don Pisto's, Chubby Noodle, Molinari Delicatessen, Lai Hong Lounge, Golden Gate Bakery, Yuet Lee, New Asia, and many, many more! Food is plenty abundant for all price points here.And SO many amazing coffee places: Caffe Greco, Caffe Trieste, Caffe Puccini, Stella Pasty and Coffee, and Reveille Coffee. Night life is also amazing. Also close by to many bars such as 15 Romolo, Devil's Acre, Comstock, Church Key, the Boardroom, Rouge, and the list goes on. You will be well-fed and well-drank living here!Favorite famous neighborhood spots include the Washington Square Park, San Francisco Jazz Mural/ Language of the Birds which reflects both the culture of North Beach and Chinatown on each side, City Lights bookstore. Also close to the police station so the neighborhood is safe.TRANSIT SCORE OF 100! No car is necessary as the transit score is literally perfect (100/100)! MUNI Lines within the same block at the 8, 8AX, 8X, 10, 12, 30. 41, 45, 91. Also exciting is the new Central Subway Chinatown Stop in development, which is only 4 blocks away (Washington and Stockton). 1 block from the Mason-Broadway cable car stop and not to mention, close to the Cable Car Museum. The building is right off the Broadway tunnel for the fastest access to the Russian Hill/ Polk Street gulch/ Pac Heights.This unit is a room within a SRO dorm style living, bathrooms/showers are shared.Furnished option availablePet-FriendlyShort term monthly premiums will apply for leases less than 12 months in durationValstock Management | www.valstockmanagement.com635 Vallejo Street, San Francisco, CA 94133show contact info | CA DRE #02081329EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITYIt is illegal to Discriminate Against Any Person Because of Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Handicap, Familial Status, or National Origin

title: VIRTUAL Tour : 5-tone Pnt, Hdwd, Archit'l Wndw : #REALNobHill
description: By popular demand in these times, we have created a beautiful folder of photos (see below link), as well as an amazing VIRTUAL TOUR available here, https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=FfuPnRt6Ehj&brand=0We LOVE San Francisco !!!                                         Do you share this feeling ?We take pride in taking care of our buildings and our Little Community in this Apartment Building. If you LOVE SF too, then come visit our building :-)GORGEOUSNESS 5-tone FRESH PAINT - AMAZING Architectural Window Dishwasher, Kitchen w Granite, Spacious Sunny Nob Hill 1 BR -- Hardwood Floors (B'tiful Lobby and Spiral Staircase)*** $2,695/month Available for Immediate Occupancy Now****Please send us email  for appointment to view this beautiful apartment.Please use the following link to find a few photos of the apartment:https://photos.google.com/share/AF1QipNVC8ij6XD-g_tVzm6ZhYoHL6Fnm0yTIuLhLW5lba1XWq92IkpjurgeIa61C9z7vg?key=TVRtRUZvS0J4N0J5TnB0aUw4MXVfdzduSVlxTTVRA little about the building : We have an absolutely beautiful Lobby Entrance with Security Gate and Modern IntercomA lot more about the apartment : Lets start with the KITCHEN which has beautifulness in everything throughout --- the kitchen has :Cherry-stain wood cabinetsGranite Counter tops, plus a beautiful breakfast IslandVinyl double-pane windows throughout, with exception of the stunning architectural central window in the living room.Appliances including: DISHWASHER (not a common find in SF units), large Gas Stove with electronic ignition and Frost Free refrigerator. Now lets go into the LIVING ROOM and BEDROOM --- Both rooms are spacious, with convenience French-style"folding" divider in between, AND lots of closet space. The Living Room is bright and warm with large southern exposure windows. As mentioned, there are vinyl double-pane windows throughout. There are beautiful modern Chandeliers throughout the unit with energy efficient CFL bulbs.Now lets walk over to the BATHROOM : New installation GLASS Shower doors. There is an overhead flexible hose shower and a bathtub, extra cabinet space, elegant ceramic sink, and toilet, AND lots of shelves for towel etc etc. Hardwood floors in living room, bed room and closets. As you look up, you will notice High ceilings with beautiful stucco mouldings. There is Large closet space with mirror doors and extra storage space for luggage. There are radiators for heat in the living areas.QUESTION : How many closets in the unit ?ANSWER : (2) Two closets in total including a walk-in closet at the entrance, and another closet with full length sliding mirror doors. As a bonus, underneath the walk-in closet is a very spacious storage area for boxes, files, golf clubs, etc.LAUNDRY * : Please contact us regarding the proposed laundry service for this unit. A little about the location : This beautiful building is one block from the California Street buses and Cable car line. We are only 2 Blocks to the Polk and Van Ness corridor restaurants, bars, clubs, and business (potential new CVS and Trader Joes around the block on Hyde St). And of course, we are only few blocks from Grace Cathedral, Huntington Park, and the major Nib Hill Hotels such as Fairmont, Ritz Carlton, Mark Hopkins. Chinatown, Financial District, Ferry Building, Union Square are close and within walking distance.Now let me tell you about Parking: We don't have parking in the building. For those of you who are new, the City will issue a C permit with your lease agreement which lets you bypass stated 2 hour limits, with the exception of Street Cleaning days/times and No Parking Any Time. Developing good parking karma will happen with time, patience, and experience. For anyone with expensive cars or working variable hours, there is paid public parking next door. There are also several parking garages within 0.5- 2 blocks.Our pet policy: A cat may be possible with additional $100 cat fee plus $15/cat/mo. We do not allow any other pets in the building.A little bit about yourself : We love interesting people with wonderful life stories, and a stable job, good income, good credit, good references and good rental history. We have our own application process and there is a $35 application fee per applicant for credit history check. This apartment is most suitable for One ( or 2 persons, if you have a wonderful room mate; he/she will also need to complete a separate application, as mentioned above. NON-SMOKERS .** Please email us to schedule appointmentPine St. at Leavenworth

IF you share the same LOVE for SFO, then please contact us and visit our Little Community in this 12 Unit NOB HILL Building.  -- 3rd floor studio, hardwood, NEW Gray Paint, NEW Kitchen faucet, open layout #REALNOBHILL** Beautiful European-looking building, Laundry in building, Bike racks available*** $1,995/month Available for Immediate Occupancy Now****Shown by appointment ONLYPlease send us email  for appointment to view this beautiful apartment.Please use the following link to find a few photos of the apartment which will help with the description below :https://photos.google.com/share/AF1QipOIsZsDWl4pD5FnzR2cfFg-NM83REj3jhPlYevmtTq_DDY5RsF5UnWsEuuJMZp_MA?key=ZGZxUkdqVGpLQ1ZoUVRWYm05ZVhQdkR2eTJ6OWdBA LOT MORE ABOUT THE STUDIO : As you reach the 3rd floor landing (3 floors in total) and open the front door, you will be greeted by warm hardwood floors and beautiful paint throughout the apartment. The ceiling has very nice vaulted details. Close the front door, and look behind you where you will find a very convenient shelf storage area. To your immediate left is the entry to the BATHROOM : There is a vanity, mirror, toilet, and shower stall w/overhead light fixture and lots of light from the window.Now walk back to the hallway, and move towards the front room area. To your LEFT is an awesome OPEN Kitchen. Lots of elbow space here and granite counters to cook and greet your guests. The kitchen has a gas burning stove, DISHWASHER (very unusual for Studios in SF !), very spacious Refrigerator and lots of cabinetsNow lets walk into the very spacious, bright, and open front room area. There are very large windows with Northern light exposure. It is quiet and peaceful ! There is a gas heater in the corner to regulate the warmth of the apartment.Now to your immediate RIGHT in this room is a full length mirrored closet with TONS of space for your many seasons worth of clothing ! On top of the closet is a very convenient area for storing boxes, and other items.INTERNET AND CABLE TV WIRED : tenant pays subscription.UTILITIES : Tenant pays for PGE services. Included in Rent are Hot and Cold, water and garbage.LAUNDRY in the building, but several Laundromats and dry cleaners within a few steps. Within this laundry area is a bike storage space : Available on first-come-first-serve basis, but you are fully responsible and must provide your own locksPlease send us email for appointment to view this beautiful apartment.A LITTLE ABOUT THE BUILDING : We have an absolutely gorgeous Building with Security Gate and Modern Intercom. The exterior of the building has a stunning European-looking flair ! There are only 12 units in the building, on 3 floors. The interior hallways and stairs have rich colors, and beautiful ornamental lights throughout.A LITTLE ABOUT THE LOCATION : This beautiful building is one block from the California Street buses and Cable car line, and of course, we are only one block from Grace Cathedral, Huntington Hotel (directly above us on California and Taylor) Huntington Park, and the major Nob Hill Hotels such as Fairmont, Ritz Carlton, Mark Hopkins. Chinatown, Financial District, Ferry Building, Union Square are close and within walking distance. We are only 5-6Blocks to the Polk and Van Ness corridor restaurants, bars, clubs, and business. TRADER JOE'S (Yes !) and CVS nearby on Hyde St. b/w Pine and California.YOU'RE PROBABLY WONDERING ABOUT PARKING : We don't have parking in the building. For those of you who are new, the City will issue a C-permit with your lease agreement which lets you bypass the 2 hour limit signs (exception of Street Cleaning days/times and No Parking Any Time). Developing good parking karma will happen with time, patience, and experience (watching Kung Fu Panda part 1 will help). For anyone with expensive cars or working variable hours, there is paid public parking next door. There are also several parking garages within 1 to 2 blocks.A LITTLE BIT ABOUT YOURSELF : We LOVE interesting people with wonderful life stories. Please be a NON-smoker with a stable job, good income, good credit, good references, good rental history. We have our own application process and there is a $35 fee per applicant . This apartment is most suitable for One ( or 2 persons, if you have a wonderful room mate; he/she will also need to complete a separate application, as mentioned above.** Please email us to schedule appointment

title: Newly Renovated Private Room #14 w/ Kitchenette - 785 Broadway #14
description: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! WALK SCORE OF 99!The room is newly remodeled with a kitchenette. Bathroom is conveniently located down the hall. The room is spacious and the perfect size for anyone who wants to experience the hustle and bustle of real San Francisco living.Located in the heart North Beach and Chinatown. Within steps from many restaurants, bars, and local markets for fresh produce and meats. Local restaurants within just a few blocks include Mama's, Tony's Pizza, the House Restaurant, Sotto Mare, the Stinking Rose, Golden Boy Pizza, Don Pisto's, Chubby Noodle, Molinari Delicatessen, Lai Hong Lounge, Golden Gate Bakery, Yuet Lee, New Asia, and many, many more! Food is plenty abundant for all price points here.And SO many amazing coffee places: Caffe Greco, Caffe Trieste, Caffe Puccini, Stella Pasty and Coffee, and Reveille Coffee. Night life is also amazing. Also close by to many bars such as 15 Romolo, Devil's Acre, Comstock, Church Key, the Boardroom, Rouge, and the list goes on. You will be well-fed and well-drank living here!Favorite famous neighborhood spots include the Washington Square Park, San Francisco Jazz Mural/ Language of the Birds which reflects both the culture of North Beach and Chinatown on each side, City Lights bookstore. Also close to the police station so the neighborhood is safe.TRANSIT SCORE OF 100! No car is necessary as the transit score is literally perfect (100/100)! MUNI Lines within the same block at the 8, 8AX, 8X, 10, 12, 30. 41, 45, 91. Also exciting is the new Central Subway Chinatown Stop in development, which is only 4 blocks away (Washington and Stockton). 1 block from the Mason-Broadway cable car stop and not to mention, close to the Cable Car Museum. The building is right off the Broadway tunnel for the fastest access to the Russian Hill/ Polk Street gulch/ Pac Heights.This unit is a room within a SRO dorm style living, bathrooms/showers are shared.Furnished option availablePet-FriendlyShort term monthly premiums will apply for leases less than 12 months in durationValstock Management | www.valstockmanagement.com635 Vallejo Street, San Francisco, CA 94133show contact info | CA DRE #02081329EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITYIt is illegal to Discriminate Against Any Person Because of Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Handicap, Familial Status, or National Origin
